home.parrafo-info: Mechatronics Engineering student at ITESM, as well as a passionate Full Stack Developer. As someone who loves technology and development, I strive to create innovative projects that deliver the best experience for users and the community.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a Technician in Programming, Web Integrity, and Big Data, with a specialization in Web Development. I have been self-taught in Full Stack Development for over 5 years.
I aim to find a job in the programming field, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional career.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, leadership, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Web Code Academy is an academy offering completely free programming and technology courses, aimed at fighting digital illiteracy.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Learn to code with Web Code Academy. Find the best online courses to start programming from scratch or improve your skills.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: SkillSync is a mobile application that connects mentors and learners to exchange knowledge and skills. All with the same purpose: to learn and teach.
proyectos.info-proyecto5: It originates from the culinary tradition of Veracruz, where each recipe has been carefully selected to offer the most authentic flavors of Mexican cuisine.
proyectos.info-proyecto6: A useful and fun tool for those who need help with their everyday tasks. A simple website that contains some math tools.
